name: IT201-007 Sprint2
description: This is a 3D painting tool that allows users to paint where the user clicks on the screen. Also, the user can modify current of future paint strokes. The user can change the size, glow, and opacity of the paint strokes based on their preferences. The user can toggle on or off time clear, or the user can they how long before the painted objected are destroyed. The app also offers multiple canvases to choose to paint on. Lastly, the current time is displayed on a clock. However, the user can change the time of day or night anytime by clicking on the clock.
